reviews.text: I've stayed in this hotel in Sept 11-13,2005
reviews.title: Just enough....

reviews.text: After internet searching, I chose this hotel because I have found out that its rate is fair.. to think that the location is near the Bugis station... very accessible! (Thumbs up!)
reviews.title: I keep returning

reviews.text: However, during the first night, I had experienced some bed bugs bite and my husband on the second...I didnt get some on the 2nd night coz I rolled up myself in the blanket...enough to hide myself from bugs and have a good sleep...
reviews.title: All you could ask for

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed September 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Wondered whether booking a budget hotel in Singapore was a wise idea, but as soon as we arrived we knew it was a good decision. Although we had not paid a deposit, the room was held for us until we arrived at 11 pm, and the friendly receptionist was extremely helpful.
reviews.title: Nice budget hotel

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed August 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room was spotlessly clean and the only drawback was a rather noisy airconditioner, but otherwise everything was fine.
reviews.title: Great Budget Hotel in Singapore

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed May 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The Chinese style breakfast was a bit of a shock to our Australian tastes, but after all, that's why you visit other cultures, to experience something new. If I had wanted Vegemite on toast I could have just stayed at home.
reviews.title: Worst ever hotel experience

reviews.text: Walking out the front door in the morning and finding a street full of colourful flower stalls and two large temples in the same block was just amazing.
reviews.title: Its gr8 for budget travellers
